name: Brent Cunningham
bio: Brent Cunningham is a writer, publisher and visual artist currently living in Oakland with his wife and daughter. His books of poetry include Bird & Forest (2005) and  Journey to the Sun (2012). He and Neil Alger founded Hooke Press, a chapbook press dedicated to publishing short runs of poetry, criticism, theory, writing and ephemera. Brent has worked for Small Press Distribution since 1999.
